hajjContent:
Your companion for managing your 
 pilgrimage journey.
campaignContent: Get all the guidance you need with easy access to campaign schedules, program timelines, lectures, and important announcements.
successContent:
You will be moved to the home screen right now. 
 Enjoy the features!
detail: Al-Tawheed Campaign is dedicated to providing a safe, organized, and spiritually enriching experience for pilgrims during Hajj. With a focus on personalized services, we ensure that every aspect of your journey is seamless, from travel arrangements to accommodations. Our experienced team is committed to guiding you through the sacred rites of Hajj with care and compassion, making your pilgrimage a fulfilling and memorable experience
emrgncyContent: Press the SOS button, your live location will be shared wih the nearest help centre and your emergency contacts.
callingContext: Please stand by, we are currently requesting for help. Your emergency contacts and nearby rescue services would see your call for help
state: Drink plenty of water to avoid dehydration, especially in hot weather.
